The claim stated that an NFL: entertainment lawyer" was found dead after revealing that the upcoming Super Bowl was rigged.
The expert: s verdict clarified that there is no NFL "entertainment lawyer" named Dan Goodes, and no one by that name recently blew the whistle on rigged football games or died in a "gangland-style execution."
The article published by YourNewsWire: which reported the false claim, was identified as a fabrication and a hoax.
The accompanying photograph in the artic: supposedly showing the crime scene, was actually taken from a July 2017 news report about a New York police officer being shot in her patrol car.
